TopicTitle: Name of mod that stops parachutes overlapping?

Articles.Content:
So I'm sure a few weeks back I saw a post somewhere, that stopped multiple parachutes overlapping, and kept them more 'outwards' like real life.

Any idea what that mod was, or perhaps I'm remembering incorrectly?

Thanks

[Stock Bug Fix](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/9728)

Read the part about "Enabling Stock Plus"
